column1: The Battle of the Peak was Gandalf name for his climactic battle with the Balrogs known as Durins Bane
column2: on the peak of the mountain called Celebdil.

column1: Gandalf pursued the Balrog from the depths of Moria. On the peak they fought for two days and nights from 23 January to 25 January . During the battle
column2: Durins Tower was destroyed and the entrance to the Endless Stair was blocked. In the end
column3: the Balrog was cast down and it broke the mountain-side as it fell. Gandalf himself died following this ordeal
column4: but was later sent back to Middle-earth with even greater powers as Gandalf the White.
